pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 2, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Tŝilhqot’in Title Lands, British Columbia

11:10 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Carolyn Bennett, will meet with the leadership of the Tŝilhqot’in National Government.

Pit House

Notes for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:40 a.m.           

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Carolyn Bennett, will attend a community event and deliver remarks.

Exoneration Site

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.
